product_overview: A web-based trading platform offering users comprehensive tools for strategy creation, backtesting, real-time signal monitoring, automated trading, and market overview with secure authentication and responsive design.
core_goals: Provide users with an intuitive interface to create and manage trading strategies.
Enable backtesting of trading strategies with clear result visualization.
Support real-time monitoring of trading signals to aid timely decision-making.
Facilitate automated trading with control panels and order management.
Ensure secure user authentication and session management with persistent login state.
Offer a responsive and user-friendly market overview dashboard.
Allow users to configure investment settings and parameters easily.
key_features: Authentication system using Supabase and Redux for login, session persistence, and profile management.
Strategy Builder component enabling users to create, save, and manage multiple trading strategies with localStorage support.
Backtesting modules to run historical tests on strategies and display results clearly.
Realtime Signal Monitor to receive and display live trading signals effectively.
Auto Trading panels including order and portfolio management interfaces for seamless automated trading operations.
Market Overview dashboard providing updated information on market conditions and trends.
Investment Settings pages to adjust parameters impacting trading behavior and strategy execution.
Performance Dashboard to visualize trading metrics and overall user portfolio performance.
Responsive landing page for non-logged-in users with optimized asset loading and interactive login CTA buttons.
user_flow_summary: User visits landing page; can navigate via CTA buttons or choose to login.
Upon login via Supabase authentication, user session is established and persisted; user profile info is loaded or defaulted appropriately.
User navigates to Strategy Builder to create or modify trading strategies; saved strategies are stored locally and managed via app state.
User runs backtests on strategies; backtest results are displayed with options to review history.
User monitors real-time trading signals via the Signal Monitor component.
User accesses Auto Trading panels to execute orders, monitor portfolio, and control automated trading features.
User uses Market Overview for general market status insights and updates.
User configures investment parameters in dedicated settings pages affecting trading algorithms.
Admin users have additional access to admin tabs and routes, controlled by authentication state.
Application handles navigation and route protection with sync between tab states and browser history.
validation_criteria: Landing page loads correctly and is responsive across desktop, tablet, and mobile devices.
LoginDialog opens upon clicking login buttons and successfully authenticates users with Supabase.
Redux state updates correctly upon authentication events, including loginSuccess and logout actions.
User sessions persist across page reloads using Supabase session management APIs.
Routing/navigation responds correctly to tab changes, admin access restrictions, and redirects for invalid routes.
Strategy Builder saves and loads strategies accurately from localStorage with proper error handling.
Backtest processes complete successfully with results displayed in the UI.
Realtime Signal Monitor receives and updates live signals without failure or delay.
Auto Trading panels reflect accurate real-time data and support order placement and portfolio management.
Investment settings changes are saved and applied correctly to influence trading behavior.
Performance Dashboard metrics update accurately based on trading activity.
Network calls to Supabase and other APIs are monitored for error rates and handled gracefully.
Landing page and app components avoid unnecessary re-renders to maintain performance standards.
